title: Soccer Simulator
fullContent: Home› SimulatorSoccer SimulatorBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenWith Soccer Simulator you can test your football skills. Playing in a team is always easier to win a match. Take the ball and run to score points against the rival team. Run faster than the opponents and pass the ball until you win the match. The victory will be much sweeter when the stadium will cheer for you. There are 2 game modes you can choose:• Player vs CPU• CPU vs CPUSoccer Simulator Controls:• WASD to move• X/Space to shoot• Z/E to pass• Tab/Escape to pauseThis article was updated on January 15, 20243DArenaBallFreeSimulatorSoccerSportsWorld Cup
